_1.english: On left side of window is result window with necessary data. Current picture represent the dealer and cards below picture present last card of dealer and team where belongs.

_2.english:
Cards field represent how many cards the player picked up on current round. 
 Points represent current point of player. 
 Zing represent additional point for the player.

_3.english: Cards on bottom of screen are cards of current player. Top to them are cards which is droped on desk.

_4.english: To pick up cards from desk drop 6 or J.

_5.english:
The oposite player droped 8 on deck. 
 Drop 8 to make ZING. You will earn 10 aditional point. In case you make ZING with J (trumps) you will earn 20 points.

_6.english:
The opposite player droped 9. 
 To pick up again drop the J. The trump is picking everything.

_7.english: Congratulations! You finished the tutorial now you can freely play the game.

_8.english:
The oposite player droped 8 on deck. 
 Drop 8 to make ZING. You will earn 10 aditional point. In case you make ZING with J (trumps) you will earn 20 points.

_9.english: The opposite player drop 9. Drop 6 on desk.

_10.english: The opposite player drop 7. Drop 7 to picked up all.

_11.english: Congratulations! You finished the tutorial now you can freely play the game.
